st: Manzilon Se Apni Dar Na Jana,
s:
Manzilon Se Apni Dar Na Jana,
Raaste Ki Preshaniyon Se Toot Na Jana,

Jab Bhi Jarurat Ho Zindagi Mein Kisi Apne Ki
Hum Aapke Apne Hain Ye Bhool Na Jana…

st: Teri Dosti Ne Bahut Kuch Sikha Diya,
s:
Teri Dosti Ne Bahut Kuch Sikha Diya,
Meri Khamosh Duniya Ko Jaise Hansa Diya,
Karjdaar Hun Main Us Khuda Ka Jisne,
Mujhe Tere Jaise Dost Se Mila Diya…

st: Kitni Jaldi Yeh Mulakat Gujar Jaati Hai,
s:
Kitni Jaldi Yeh Mulakat Gujar Jaati Hai,
Pyas Bujhti Nahi Ke Barsaat Gujar Jaati Hai,
Aapki Yaadon Se Kah Do Ke Yun Na Aaya Karen,
Neend Aati Nahi Aur Raat Gujar Jaati Hai…

st: Maangi Thi Mot To Zindgi Mil Gayi,
s:
Maangi Thi Mot To Zindgi Mil Gayi,
Andhere me bhi mujhe roshni mil gayi,
Poocha khuda se naseeb me kiya hai mere,
To sabse haseen tohfa Aapki Friendship Mil Gayi…

st: True friends are for life
s:
True friends are for life
Until the end
They are more than special
They are your best friends.

They are the one you can go to
When you are in despair
The ones that will help you
Even when you got gum in your hair!

They are the one who will laugh
And go laughing with you all through
the night
The ones who will help you
Help you with all their might.

To have a good friend
You have to be one
So be nice to one another
So you can be friends forever
And that’s how to be the best friend you can be.

st: College Ki Khali Seatein
s:
College Ki Khali Seatein
Ghadi Ghadi Teacher Ki Daante
Bunk Mar Ke Canteen Jana
Table Baja Ke Gaaney Gana
Aaj Phir Lag Gayi Yaado Ki Jhadi
Bina Dosto Ke Kya Jindgi

Teacher Ki Wo Hamse Rukhai
Hum Jo Kartey They Padahai Se Bewafai
Sir Ka Har Baat Pe Samjhana
Ab Sararat Ki To Dobara Class Me Baat Aana

Wo Chemistry Ki Classey
Aur Query Me Gilli Gilli Aankhey
Sir Ka Batana “Padh Loo Warna
Chemistry Ho Jayegi Bewafa
Subah Rati Shyam Ko Sapa”
Sir Ki Baat Pe Sar Hilana
Phir Wapas Ussi Attitude Me Aa Jaana

Exam Me Ek Dusrey Ka Muh Takna
Jo Aata Nahi Uskey Liye Idhar Udar Jhankna
Aur Musibat Ka Aana
Dosto Ke Roll No. Ka Alag Alag Ho Jana
Wo Mann Hi Mann God Ko Pukarna
Ab Tujhey Hi Hai Iss Musibat Se Par Utarna

Wo Aakhir Me Farewell Ka Aana
Aur Phir Dosto Ka Alag Ho Jana
Ek Dusrey Ke Galey Lag Kar Rona
Aur Ek Dusrey Se Kehna “You are my beloved Friends OK”
Alag Ho Rahey Ho Par Mujhey Mat Bhulana
Aaj Phir Lag Gayi Yaado Ki Jhadi
Bina Dosto Ke Kya Jindgi

st: Main Dosti Ka Farz Nibhana Chahta Hoon
s:
Main Dosti Ka Farz Nibhana Chahta Hoon
Rishte Ki Gehrai Aazmana Chahta Hoon
Jo Barish Ki Boondo Mein Mere Aansu Pehchan Le
Ek Friend Aisa Banana Chahta Hoon…

st: Bichhadne Wale Ko Yaad Mein Kya Doge
s:
Bichhadne Wale Ko Yaad Mein Kya Doge
Sote Huye Ko Khwab Mein Kya Doge
Hum Chahte Hain Umar Bhar Ki Friendship Ka Vaada
Mere Is Sawal Ka Jawab Kya Doge…

st: Rishton Ki Dori Kamzor Hoti Hai
s:
Rishton Ki Dori Kamzor Hoti Hai
Aankho Ki Baatein Dil Ki Chor Hoti Hai
Kisi Ne Jab Bhi Pucha Friendship Ka Matlab
Hamari Ungli Aapki Aur Hoti Hai

st: Pal Bhar Mein Toot Jaye Voh Kasam Nahi
s:
Pal Bhar Mein Toot Jaye Voh Kasam Nahi
Apne Friend Ko Bhool Jayein Voh Hum Nahi
Tum Hume Bhool Jao Is Baat Mein Bhi Dum Nahi
Kyon Ki Tum Hume Bhool Jao Itne Bure Hum Nahi

st: Kuch Meethe Pal Yaad Aate Hain
s:
Kuch Meethe Pal Yaad Aate Hain
Palko Par Aansu Chor Jate Hain
Kal Koi Aur Mil Jaye Toh Hume Na Bhool Jana
Friendship Ke Relation Zindagi Bhar Kaam Aate Hain

st: In Andhero Ke Liye Kuch Aaftab Maange Hain
s:
In Andhero Ke Liye Kuch Aaftab Maange Hain
Dua Mein Hum Ne ‘Friends’ Kuch Khaas Maange Hain
Jab Bhi Manga Kuch Rab Se
To Aap Ke Liye Khushiyon Ka Pal Mage Hain

st: Chiraago Se Agar Andhere Door Hote
s:
Chiraago Se Agar Andhere Door Hote
To Chandni Ki Chahat Kise Hoti
Kat Sakti Agar Ye Zindagi Akele
To “Friendship” Naam Ki Cheez Hi Kyun Hoti?

st: Jo Har Pal Jalti Rahe, Use Roshni Kehte Hain
s:
Jo Har Pal Jalti Rahe, Use Roshni Kehte Hain
Jo Pal Pal Chalti Rahe, Use Zindagi Kehte Hain
Jo Pal Pal Khilti Rahe, Use Mohabbat Kehte Hain
Jo Sath Na Chode, Use Apni Friendship Kehte Hain…

st: Mulaqat Maut Ki Mehman Ho Gayi
s:
Mulaqat Maut Ki Mehman Ho Gayi
Nazar Ki Zindagi Sunsaan Ho Gayi
Ab Meri Saans Bhi Meri Nahi Rahi
Yeh Zindagi Aapki Friendship Par Qurban Ho Gayi…

st: Tum Milo Ya Na Milo Koi Gham Nahi
s:
Tum Milo Ya Na Milo Koi Gham Nahi
Bas Sms Karo Yeh Milne Se Kam Nahi
Friendship Mein Dhoka De Voh Hum Nahi
Hamari Friendship Bhi Krishan Aur Sudama Se Kam Nahi…

st: Friendship Ka Pehla Salaam Aapke Naam
s:
Friendship Ka Pehla Salaam Aapke Naam
Hamari Zindagi Ki Aakhri Sham Aapke Naam
Is Safar Mein Humsafar Hum Dono
Zindagi Bhar Is Friendship Ko Nibhana Hai Mera Kaam…

st: Friendship Beautiful Hai
s:
Friendship Beautiful Hai
Tum Na Mano Par Ye Haqikat Hai
Friendship Insaan Ki Zarurat Hai
Kisi Din Aao Hamari Mehfil Mein
Jaan Jaoge Zindagi Kitni Khubsurat Hai…

st: Friendship Se Aaj Pyar Sharmaya Hai
s:
Friendship Se Aaj Pyar Sharmaya Hai
Teri Friendship Ne Hume Jina Sikhaya Hai
Kya Maange Khuda Se Hum
Woh To Khud Aaj Mere Dar Par
Teri Jaisi Friendship Maang Ne Aaya Hai…

st: Love + Care + Hope = “Maa”
s:
Love + Care + Hope = “Maa”
Darr + Prem + Respect = “Papa”
Play + Help = “Brothers & Sisters”
Sukh + Dukh = “Wife”
Above all these + Life = “Friend”

st: Friendship Rules
s:
Friendship Rules
No Drama
No Excuse
No Sorry
No Thanks
& don’t say i am Busy’
Always say yaar Tere Liye to mari jann B Hazir Hai.
Bus kabi Mangna mat.

st: दुनियादारी में हम थोड़े कच्चे हैं पर दोस्ती के
s:
दुनियादारी में हम थोड़े कच्चे हैं पर दोस्ती के
मामले में सच्चे है... हमारी सच्चाई बस इस बात
पर कायम है, की हमारे दोस्त हमसे भी अच्छे है...

st: The friend who can be silent with us in a moment of despair or confusion, who can stay with us in an hour of grief and bereavement, who can tolerate not knowing... not healing, not curing... that is a friend who cares..
s: The friend who can be silent with us in a moment of despair or confusion, who can stay with us in an hour of grief and bereavement, who can tolerate not knowing... not healing, not curing... that is a friend who cares..

st: Har Koi Pyar Ke Liye Tarapta Hai…
s:
Har Koi Pyar Ke Liye Tarapta Hai…

Har Koi Pyar Ke Liye Rota Hai….

Mere Pyar Ko Galat Mat Samajh Na….

Pyar To Dosti Mein Bhi Hota Hai

st: Khushi Ke Aasu Rukne Na Dena
s:
Khushi Ke Aasu Rukne Na Dena
Gum Ke Aasu Bahne Na Dena
Yeh Zindagi Na Jane Kab Ruk Jayegi
Magar Ye Pyari Si Relationsip Kabhi Tutne Na Dena…

st: Dosti ki raho mai kabhi akelapan na mile,
s:
Dosti ki raho mai kabhi akelapan na mile,
aai dost zindagi mai tumhe kabhi gum na mile,
dua karte hai hum khuda se,
tuhme jo bhi dost mile hum se kam na mile…

st: Waqt mile to hamein bhi yaad kar lena
s:
Waqt mile to hamein bhi yaad kar lena
pal pal na sahi din mein ek bar yaad kar lena
dost honge aap ke hazaar par
ham bhi un mien se ek hain itna yaad kar lena..

st: Kuch dost zindagi me is kadar samil ho jate
s:
Kuch dost zindagi me is kadar samil ho jate
he.Agar bhulana chaho to or yad aate he
bas jate he wo dil me is kadar ki
aankhe band karo to samne nazar ate he…

st: Karoge yaad ek din dosti k zamane ko,
s:
Karoge yaad ek din dosti k zamane ko,
hum chale jaynge ek din wapis na ane ko,
zikr jab ched dega koi mehfil me humara,
chale jaoge tanhai me aansoo bahane ko…

st: Kyun mushkilon mein saath dete hain dost
s:
Kyun mushkilon mein saath dete hain dost
Kyun gham ko baant lete hain dost
Na rishta khoon ka na riwaaz se bandha
Phir bhi zindagi bhar saath dete hain dost!

st: Doston ki dosti hamain raas bahut Aai,
s:
Doston ki dosti hamain raas bahut Aai,
zindagi hamari khuli kitaab najar Aai,
sb padh liye sabak us kitaab mai se,
zindagi mai Mout ki, Aadhuri pyaas najar Aai…

st: Is kadar hum yaar ko manane nikle,
s:
Is kadar hum yaar ko manane nikle,
Uski chahat ke hum deewane nikle,
Jab bhi use dil ka haal batana chaha,
To uske hothon se waqt na hone ke bahane nikle…

st: Jo dil ke karib hi nahi saanso me base ho,
s:
Jo dil ke karib hi nahi saanso me base ho,
Dost sache agar sath ho to roya nahi karte.
Jo ho jeene ki wajah vo har pal yaad aate hai,
Gum me bhi sukun de ese doston ko khoya nahi karte…

st: Duriya hote huye bhi safar vahi rahega,
s:
Duriya hote huye bhi safar vahi rahega,
Door hote huye bhi dostana vahi rahega,
Bahot mushkil he ye safar zindgi ka,
Agar aapka sath hoga to ehesas vahi rahega…

st: Jab Koi Khayal Dil Se Takrata Hai
s:
Jab Koi Khayal Dil Se Takrata Hai
Dil Na Chah Ker Bhi Khamosh Ho Jata Hai
Koi Sab Kuch Keh Ker Dosti Jatata Hai,
To Koi Kuch Na Keh K Dosti Nibhata Hai…

st: Andhere Main Rasta Banana Mushkil Hota Hai
s:
Andhere Main Rasta Banana Mushkil Hota Hai
Tufan Main Dipak Jalana Mushkil Hota Hai
Dosti Kisi Se Bhi Karna Mushkil Nahi
Magar Ise Nibhana Bada Mushkil Hota Hai..

st: Zindagi K Tufano Ka Sahil Hai Teri Dosti
s:
Zindagi K Tufano Ka Sahil Hai Teri Dosti
Dil Ke Armaano Ki Manzil Hai Teri Dosti
Zindagi Bhi Ban Jayegi Apni To Jannat
Agar Maut Aane Tak Sath De Teri Dosti…

st: Hum Woh Phool Hain Jo Roz Roz NahiKhiltay
s:
Hum Woh Phool Hain Jo Roz Roz NahiKhiltay
Yeh Wo Hont Hain Jo Kabhi Nahin Siltay
Hum Se Bichro Ge To Ehsas Hoga Tumhain
Hum Wo Dost Hain Jo Roz Roz Nahin Miltay…

st: Zindagi K Tufano Ka Sahil Hai Teri Dosti
s:
Zindagi K Tufano Ka Sahil Hai Teri Dosti
Dil Ke Armaano Ki Manzil Hai Teri Dosti
Zindagi Bhi Ban Jayegi Apni To Jannat
Agar Maut Aane Tak Sath De Teri Dosti…

st: Teri palkon pe khwab rakh gaya koi
s:
Teri palkon pe khwab rakh gaya koi
Teri saanso pe naam likh gaya koi
Chalo wada raha bhool jana hame
Agar humse achha yaar tumhe mil gaya koi…

st: Dosto Ki Kami Ko Pehchante Hain Hum.
s:
Dosto Ki Kami Ko Pehchante Hain Hum.
Duniya Ke Ghamon Ko Bhi Jante Hain Hum.
Aap Jaise Dosto Ke Hi Sahare.
Aaj Bhi Has Kar Jeena Jante Hai Hum…

st: Hasrato ki nigaho pe shaqt pehra hai,
s:
Hasrato ki nigaho pe shaqt pehra hai,
Na jaane kis umeed par dil thehra hai,
Teri chahaton ki kasam ae dost,
Apni dosti ka rishta to pyaar se bhi gehra hai..

st: Wo Doston Ki Mehfil, Vo Muskratey Pal,
s:
Wo Doston Ki Mehfil, Vo Muskratey Pal,
Dil Se Judaa Nhi Apnaa Beetaa Hua Kal,
Kabhi Zindgi Guzrti Thi Wqt Bitaney Mein,
Aaj Wqt Guzarta Hai Zindgi Bitaney Mein…..

st: Aaj Khushiyon Ki Koi Badhai Dega,
s:
Aaj Khushiyon Ki Koi Badhai Dega,
Nikla Hai Chand To Dikhai Dega,
Ae Dost Dosti Ki Hai Humne Aapse,
Aapka Ek Aansu Bhi Ghira To Sunai Dega..

st: Kashish dil ki har cheez bhula deti hai,
s:
Kashish dil ki har cheez bhula deti hai,
Band aakhon mein bhi sapne saja deti hai,
Sapno ki duniya jarur rakhna dost,
Kyun ki hakikat to aksar logo ko rula deti hai…

st: Jo dil ke karib hi nahi saanso me base ho,
s:
Jo dil ke karib hi nahi saanso me base ho,
Dost sache agar sath ho to roya nahi karte.
Jo ho jeene ki wajah vo har pal yaad aate hai,
Gum me bhi sukun de ese doston ko khoya nahi karte…

st: Kon kehta hai dost ki tumse humari judaai hogi,
s:
Kon kehta hai dost ki tumse humari judaai hogi,
yeh afwaah zroor kissi dushman ne udaayi hogi,
shaan se rahenge tumahre dil mein hum,
itne dino mein kuch to jagah bnayi hogi…

st: Tere dosti me ek nasha hai,
s:
Tere dosti me ek nasha hai,
Tabhi to yeh saari duniya hamse khafa hai,
Naa karo hamse itni dosti,
Ki dil hi hamse puchhe teri dhadkan kahan hai…

st: Teri dosti mein khud ko mehfooz maante hain,
s:
Teri dosti mein khud ko mehfooz maante hain,
Hum doston mein tumhe sabse azeez maante hain.
Teri dosti ke saaye mein zinda hain,
Hum to tujhe khuda ka diya hua tabeez maante hain…

st: Duriya hote huye bhi safar vahi rahega,
s:
Duriya hote huye bhi safar vahi rahega,
Door hote huye bhi dostana vahi rahega,
Bahot mushkil he ye safar zindgi ka,
Agar aapka sath hoga to ehesas vahi rahega…

st: Har insan ki apni pahchan hoti hai.
s:
Har insan ki apni pahchan hoti hai.
Magar hamare sms ki apni shan hoti hai!
Har kisi ko him nahi karte sms magar!
Jis ko karte hai hum msg usme hamari jan hoti hai.

st: Kal raat khuda ne puchha ,tu itna dosto mein kyun khoya hai,
s:
Kal raat khuda ne puchha ,tu itna dosto mein kyun khoya hai,
tab andar se ye awaaz aayi,
dosto ne hi to di hai khushiyan,
pyar karke to hamesha ye dil roya hai…

st: Dosti nazaro se ho to use kudarat kahate hai,
s:
Dosti nazaro se ho to use kudarat kahate hai,
Sitaro se ho to use zannat kahate hai,
Husan se ho to use mohabbat kahate hai,
Aur dosti aapse ho to use kismat kahate hai…

st: Dil me tumhaare apni kami chod jaayenge,
s:
Dil me tumhaare apni kami chod jaayenge,
Aakhon me intzaar ki lakeer chod jaayenge,
Yaad rakhna mujhe dhoondhte firoge ek din,
Zindagi me dosti ki kahaani chod jaayenge…

st: Pyare se dost ho tum,
s:
Pyare se dost ho tum,
Har pal mere saath ho tum,
Dosti ki ek aas ho tum,
Mere maan ka ek vishwas ho tum,
Shayad isliye kuch khaas ho tum…

st: Palbhar mein toot jaye wo kasam nahi,
s:
Palbhar mein toot jaye wo kasam nahi,
Dost ko bhul jaye wo hum nahi,
Tum hume bhool jao is baat mein dum nahi,
Kyon ki tum hame bhul jao itne bure hum nahi.

st: Hum doston ko bhulte nahi hain,
s:
Hum doston ko bhulte nahi hain,
Magar yeh baat jatate nahi hain…
Doston ko hamesha rakhte hain yaad,
Hum bhulne ke liye dost banate nahi hain..

st: Tujhe dekhe bina teri tasvir bana sakta hoon,
s:
Tujhe dekhe bina teri tasvir bana sakta hoon,
Tujhse mile bina tera haal bata sakta hoon,
Hai meri dosti mein itna dum,
Apni aankh ka aansoo teri aankh se gira sakta hoon…

st: Ye Dost B Ajeeb Hotay Hain,
s:
Ye Dost B Ajeeb Hotay Hain,
Denay Pay Aaen To Jan Day Dain,
Lenay Pay Aaen To Hansi Tak Cheen Lain,
Kehnay Pay Aaen To Dil K Tmam Khano K Raz Tak Keh Dain,
Chupanay Pay Aaen To Ye Tak Na Btaen K Khafa Q Hain,
Naraz Honay Pay Aaen To Sans Tak Na Lenay Dain,
Mnanay Pay Aaen To Apni Sanso Ko War Dain,
Bus Dost Zindagi Mein Nahi Mila Krtay Blkay,
Zindagi Doston Men Mila Krti Hy….

st: Rab se aap ki khushi mangte hain,
s:
Rab se aap ki khushi mangte hain,
Duaon me aap ki hansi mangte hain,
sochte hain ki kya mange aap se…..
chalo umar bhar ki Dosti mangte hain….
`
Khuda na kare aapko kabhi koi gam mile,
khushiyan aur hansi har dam mile,
gum jab bhi bad chale aapki aur…..
khuda kare raaste me use hum mile…
`
Ankhen to Dosti me Dil ki zuban hoti hai,
Sachhi Dosti to sada bezubaan hoti hai,
Dosti me judai bhi aae to kya ghabrana…..
suna hai judai se Dosti aur bhi jawan hoti hai…..!
`
Ehsaas bahut hoga jab hum chhod k jayege,
Royenge bahut magar aasu nahi aayenge,
Jab saath na de koi to aawaj hume dena,
Aasma per bhi honge to laut aayenge.
`
Do pal ki zindgi, yu hi beet jayegi.
Kali raat k baad nayi Subah ayegi.
Agar Doston ki yaad satayegi to kasam se
aapki yaad sabse pehle aayegi…..!

st: Dosti khubsurat hai
s:
Dosti khubsurat hai
Tum na mano ye haqikat hai.
Dosti insan ki zarurat hai.
Kisi din aao hamari mehfil me,
Jan jaoge zindagi kitni khubsurat hai…

st: Jaane Wale Aur Honge
s:
Jaane Wale Aur Honge
Hum To Yahi Reh Jaenge
Paana Chahoge Hame Kabhi
Aas Paas Mil Jaenge
Aawaaz Doge Ek Baar
Kabr Se Bhi Uth Kar Aaenge
Mehfil Sazaa Kar To Dekho Hamaare Bagair
Joote Sar Par Tumhare Lagaenge
Ik Dosti Nibhani Sikhi Yaara
Is Daulat Ko Na U Gawaenge
Rooth Jaenge Tere Saare Dost
Kabhi Loveleen Ko Na Sang Apne Paenge
Kar Shak Na Humpe Itna Tu
Hum Roothe To Rab Bhi Na Mana Paenge …

st: Zindgi mohtaj nahi manzilon ki,
s:
Zindgi mohtaj nahi manzilon ki,
Waqt har manzil dikha deta hai..
Marta anhi koi kisi ki judai me,
Waqt sabko jeena sikha deta hai..

st: Dosti se aaj pyaar sharmaya hai
s:
Dosti se aaj pyaar sharmaya hai
Teri dosti ne humein jina sikhaya hai
Kya maange khuda se hum
Woh to khud aaj mere dar par
Teri dosti maangne aaya hai.

st: Dost kabhi dosto se khafaa nahi hote..
s:
Dost kabhi dosto se khafaa nahi hote..
Mil jaye dil to kabhi juda nahi hote
Bhula dena meri kamiyon ko.
Kyu ki insan kabhi khuda nahi hote….

st: Har khamoshi ka matlab inkaar nahi hota,
s:
Har khamoshi ka matlab inkaar nahi hota,
Har nakamyabi ka matlab haar nahi hota.
Toh kya huwa agar hum tume na pasake,
Sirf paane ka matlab pyar nahi hota.

st: Aey dost dosti pe shak na kar,
s:
Aey dost dosti pe shak na kar,
Yeh hum nahi tere nishan kehte hai,
Tu hi hai sachcha dost,
Yeh hum baar baar kehte hai.

st: Suchh Kehte Hain Log Ke
s:
Suchh Kehte Hain Log Ke
Succhha Dost Zindagi Ke Shaan Hain
Main Abtak Dhund Nahi Paaya
Ke Mera Succhha Dost Kaun Hain
Meri Nazar Se Dekhoo
Toh Mera Her Ek Dost Meri Jaan Hain
Par Unki Sabse Pyarii Cheez
Apni Apni Jaan Hain
Isi Khayaal Mein Yaaro
Mera Dil Pareshaan Hain
Main Abtak Dhundh Nahi Payaa
Ke Mera Succhha Dost Kaun Hain….

st: Mohabbat Dosti Ka Naam Hai Agar
s:
Mohabbat Dosti Ka Naam Hai Agar
Tu Chalu Aak Dosray Kay
Dost Ban Jaay Aaak Dosray Ko Janay
Aak Dosray Ko Pahchanay
Aak Dosray Ki Adato Say
Waqif Ho Jay Chalu Aak Dosray Kay
Dost Ban Jaay Aak Dosray Ki Manae
Aak Dosray Ko Manaaay
Kabhi Rooth Jaay Kabhi Maan Jaay
Chaloo Aak Dosray Kay Dost Ban Jaay…

st: Zindagi nahin humein doston se pyaari,
s:
Zindagi nahin humein doston se pyaari,
Doston pe haazir hai jaan hamaari,
Aankhon mein hamaari aansoon hai toh kya,
Jaan se bhi pyaari hai muskaan tumhaari !

st: Bahane bahane se aapki baat karte hai,
s:
Bahane bahane se aapki baat karte hai,
Har pal aapko mehsus karte hai,
Itni baar to aap saans bhi nahi lete honge,
Jitni baar hum aaapko yaad karte hai….

st: Yakeen to humein sir tum pe hai
s:
Yakeen to humein sir tum pe hai
Varna na jaane yahan kitne chehre hai
Hum to wada karte hain dosti kaa
Bas aap se bhi dost kehlane ki aas hai

st: Aapki dosti pe hai humein aeitbaar
s:
Aapki dosti pe hai humein aeitbaar
Samne honge aapke
Aap dil se bula ke to dekho humein ek baar.

st: Dosti naam hai sukh dukh ki kahani ka
s:
Dosti naam hai sukh dukh ki kahani ka
Dosti naam hai sada muskurany ka
Ye koi pal bhar ki pehchan nahi
Dosti naam hai sada sath nibhana ka

st: Jahan judai ho wahan milan ka alag mazaa hai
s:
Jahan judai ho wahan milan ka alag mazaa hai
Mehboob bewafaa ho to zindagi ek sazaa hai
Aap jaisa dost agar har kisiko naseeb ho
Ye to bas khuda ki razaa hai.

st: Sham ki tanhai mein kho na jaana,
s:
Sham ki tanhai mein kho na jaana,
Kisi ki masti mein doob na janaa,
Milengi zarur manzilein tumhe,
Unhe pakar hum jaise doston ko bhool na jana…

st: Yah dosti chirag hai ,isse jalaye rakhana
s:
Yah dosti chirag hai ,isse jalaye rakhana
yah dosti gul hai isse khilaye rakhana.
Hum rahe na rahe iss jahan main.
Bus hamari yaad dil me basaye rakhana.
Milana bichudna sab kismato ka khel hai,
Kahi nafrat to kahidilo ka mail hai,
Bik jaye hai har riste iss duniya me,
Sirf dost hi dost ko kam kaam aata hai.
Dosti wo anmol rista hai,Jo bade yatno se khoji jati hai
Prem, mukut, komal dhage me piro kar moti,
Haar gale ka ban jati hai.
Koshish kijiye hame yaad karane ki,
Lamhe to apane aap hi mil jayenge,
Tamanna kijiye ham se milane ki,
Bahane to apane aap hi mil jayenge.

st: Tere saath guzra lamha jab bhi yaad ayega
s:
Tere saath guzra lamha jab bhi yaad ayega
Is janam ke baad bhi tera khayal layega
Agar bakshi bar bar zindagi Uparwale ne mujhe
Tujse dosti karne ko hardum ji chahega…

st: Nadiyon ki dosti sagar se hai
s:
Nadiyon ki dosti sagar se hai
Badal ki dosti ambar se hai
Chand ki dosti sitaron se hai
Fulon ki dosti khushbu se hai
Parvat ki dosti jharno se hai
Bagon ki dosti kaliyon se hai
Umangon ki dosti dil se hai
Humari dosti sirf aap se hai…

st: Friendship is a collection of hearts,
s:
Friendship is a collection of hearts,
Ready 2 give, share and understand.
It never fades & never ends.
It only reminds us that life is not perfect without a friend…

st: Dosti Se Qeemti Koi Jageer Nahi,
s:
Dosti Se Qeemti Koi Jageer Nahi,
Dosti Se Khubsoorat Koi Tasveer Nahi,
Dosti To sirf Ek Kaccha Dhaga Hai,
Dhage Se Majboot Koi Janjeer Nahi.

st: Dua karte hai hum sar jhuka kar a dost tu manjil ko paye
s:
Dua karte hai hum sar jhuka kar a dost tu manjil ko paye
Kabhi teri raho me andhera aaye to roshni ke liye khuda hame jalaye

st: Offer a thousand chances to your enemy to become your friend
s:
Offer a thousand chances to your enemy to become your friend
Never give a single chance to your friend to become your enemy

st: Dosti ke mayne hamse kya puchte ho,
s:
Dosti ke mayne hamse kya puchte ho,
Hum abhi in baton se anjaan hain,
Sirf ek gujarish hai ke bhool na jana hame,
Kyonki aapki dosti hi hamari jaan hai…….

st: Muskurana hi Khushi nahi hoti,
s:
Muskurana hi Khushi nahi hoti,
Umar bitana hi Zindagi nahi hoti,
Khud se bhi zyada khayal rakhna padta hai dosto ka,
Kyoki Dost kehna hi Dosti nahi hoti.

st: Ful ki shuruwat kalise hoti hai,
s:
Ful ki shuruwat kalise hoti hai,
Zindagi ki shuruwat jaan se hoti hai,
Pyaar ki shuruwat dosti se …
Aur dosti ki shuruwat aapase hoti hai !!!
Nazar andaz kaise kare aapko,
nazron me bithaya hai jo aapko,
yaad aane par roye bhi to kaise,
darte hai jhuki jo palke to chubhengi aapko.
Duniya mein koi kisi ke liye kuch nahi karta
Marne wale ke saath har koi nahi marta
Arey… Marne ki baat to door rahi
Yahan to zindgi hai phir bhi koi yaad nahi karta
Dinse raat hone ko aaai hai
Pata nahin ye kaisi judai hai
Parwah nahin karte wo apne dost ki
Na jane ye kaisi dosti nibhai hai

st: Rishton ki dori kamzor hoti hai,
s:
Rishton ki dori kamzor hoti hai,
Aankhon ki baatein dil ki chor hoti hai,
Khuda ne jab bhi pucha dosti ka matlab,
Hamari ungli aapki aur hoti hai.
